title: Save Vanra
content: Mermaid At Basilisk gate, we met a distraught Lora. She claimed her daughter Vanra is missing, and that she vanished when the pair were in The Blushing Mermaid. She begged us for help. The Blushing Mermaid bartender told us that Lora was behaving strangely - she even pulled a knife on him. The owner of the tavern, Captain Grisly, had to throw Lora out. We should speak to Captain Grisly about it. The cellar of The Blushing Mermaid looks just like a hag's lair. We need to speak to the owner, Capt
